metadata.title: CVE-2024-51442 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Command Injection in Minidlna version v1.3.3 and before allows an attackerto execute arbitrary OS commands via a specially crafted minidlna.confconfiguration file.

criterions.comment: minidlna package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
